channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This is the best nut to eat if you want to lower your colorectal cancer risk, study finds
item.description: It may be time to add a handful of this nut to your daily snack rotation.

item.title: Trump ending the tariff loophole that allowed companies to cheaply ship 4 million packages per day from China to the U.S. could raise prices even further
item.description: Consumers can expect higher prices and delivery delays when the Trump administration ends a duty-free exemption on low-value imports from China.

item.title: Robinhood says customers deposited a record $6.5 billion in April as active traders try to profit off market chaos
item.description: CEO Vlad Tenev said the company has become “more resilient” by targeting sophisticated retail investors.

item.title: The mystery of Elon Musk’s future deepens as Tesla CEO speaks out about DOGE multitasking
item.description: “Being attacked relentlessly is not super fun," Elon Musk said.

item.title: Elon Musk says the major work of establishing DOGE is done and calls it a ‘way of life, like Buddhism’
item.description: Amid protests and Tesla stock market drops, Musk is pivoting away from Washington.

item.title: Tens of millions in Europe lost power this week. No one seems to know why.
Tariff relief offered to car companies by Trump fails to address 2 top concerns
You’re seeing a stock-market rebound that nobody wanted: Nomura strategist
American manufacturing is slumping again. U.S. trade policy is a factor.
‘Sell America’ fears are evolving into a ‘buy less’ posture in the bond market
